display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Oq988GeM_usQ7kNvwHiW4EH&_nc_oc=Adm2bPpFEnATE9qbCXKgoTetxiXFLY_ozt1t3uN4Mlcli6GuAuZ9CWnOmGcyWpnztnI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bPCuSylQdN6L6-vqzyW57A&oh=00_Afpx6RYacrvn4SZUCwKzuAM2ovxc08ZvxN3fKbGyd7d5Dw&oe=6965DDC9)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fUoMtGoT1QAQ7kNvwEeMZSy&_nc_oc=AdmEXO9gqRTQIZXM0589OJNF22mXTZH8RzOOO14BVKnWwDqrFked2bQRocoOGNZRpFY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bPCuSylQdN6L6-vqzyW57A&oh=00_Afo_ObtwtTYx0TcAbjrqDw3zNRdVLS34bvXCmuHkKskbsQ&oe=6965EB1D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=hNYxv-9skQgQ7kNvwF3ZMnU&_nc_oc=Adlc0O2PY4opywsmlnHdlzwaeauoPUgXPUGD6FeUDXA0QVnoFiGWeAE1sxH7rkkNdE4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bPCuSylQdN6L6-vqzyW57A&oh=00_AfpKKePq9703YBmDm2gsPVRbLxGj8dXGxfcUsz9zfcgP7g&oe=6965D8D2)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=pqV0GJKTD8YQ7kNvwGXvTu-&_nc_oc=AdncWcYf5O5ukf-BfhmdT8GPi205rZSP-mZZuGqglraCb8GSmTepFiKXmTAHnVUGdV4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=bPCuSylQdN6L6-vqzyW57A&oh=00_AfpEzrOkvSWt_VVu4frhe60qptwbv441DMMZ-9rrsSd1bA&oe=6965F302)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
